author: jih2nn
content: Great to hear! Where is that picture come from by the way?

author: jih2nn
content: Currently, that section of the EIP is misleading. We have a pending [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9381) that fixes it. I do think we need to have it addressed as more and more people found the EIP confusing. I'll make sure we cover this issue in the upcoming breakout.

author: jochembrouwer
content: I will check the EIP PR! Will also join the call this Tuesday to listen in üòÑ üëç
